N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 62-5.2 - Designated fire investigation agency

State Regulations
(a) Pursuant to section
3415 (b)
of the Insurance Law, each city with a population of one million or more persons shall designate a local fire investigation agency (the agency). (b) The agency designated by the Mayor of the City of New York is the Bureau of Fire Investigation of the New York City Fire Department. All required information should be sent to that agency, located at: 9 Metrotech, 8th Floor

Brooklyn, NY 11201

Attention: Deputy Chief Fire Marshal

Insurance Reporting Section
